gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 123, Bucks 97
gameRecap.excerpt: Bam Adebayo’s (16 points, 12 rebounds, 11 assists) second triple-double of the season leads the Heat over the Bucks, 123-97.  Nikola Jovic (career-high 24 points, five 3PM) and Duncan Robinson (23 points, five assists, six 3PM) added a combined 47 points in the victory.  Giannis Antetokounmpo tallied 23 points, 11 rebounds and eight assists for the Bucks in the losing effort.  The Heat improve to 29-25 on the season, while the Bucks fall to 35-20.
